function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty about the severity and duration of the crisis","Impact":"Difficulty forecasting the recovery of the construction industry","Mitigation":"Enhancing scenario planning and risk assessment","Technologies":"Data analytics and predictive modeling tools","People":"Construction industry stakeholders, project managers, and workers","Owner":"Construction industry associations and research institutions"},{"Description":"Challenges faced by construction industry stakeholders due to COVID-19","Impact":"Disruption of ongoing and future construction projects","Mitigation":"Implementing health and safety protocols, remote work policies, and contingency plans","Technologies":"Remote monitoring and communication tools, IoT for contactless operations","People":"Construction project stakeholders, workers, and managers","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, and health and safety experts"},{"Description":"Lack of clear guidance on best practices for construction industry recovery","Impact":"Unpreparedness for the transition toward the new normal","Mitigation":"Providing concise integrated resources and research guidelines, discussing short-and long-term impacts, and identifying potential research streams","Technologies":"Knowledge management systems, collaborative platforms for information sharing","People":"Construction industry professionals, researchers, and academics","Owner":"Industry associations, research institutions, and collaborative networks"}]}
